channel.title: Running a client or server
channel.description: Well when I try to run any client or servers, it says 'java is not recognized as an internal or external command... It has nothing to do with enviormental variables because I haven't deleted or messed with the variables.... I've tried downloading new versions of java and everything...

item.title: Running a client or server
item.dc:creator: @rs3andfsu rs3andfsu
item.description:
@rs3andfsu wrote:

yeah ive got that problem with allstarscape v2 which i just got and havent edited yet but mine says different ok so ive got java jdk 6.13 aka java 6 update 13

but it says this when i try to compile or run

you do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0

Read full topic

item.title: Running a client or server
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

No, I mean I get this for every single client and server I try to run… I doubt all of them are wrong

Read full topic

item.title: Running a client or server
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

hmm…
sounds like the batch aint fuly correct… try this one… and no its not gonna be the same just because it says java in it… for some reason it will read it diferentally…

@echo off COLOR 09 title Kenshinscape Client V9 @echo Kenshinscape Client V9 @echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause
BUT WAIT>… if yours runs threw and EGUI please use this one isntead…

@echo off COLOR 09 title Kenshinscape Client V9 @echo Kenshinscape Client V9 @echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ java -Xmx1000m -cp .;client pause

either of these should work… if you still have problem just pm me

Read full topic
